pages.text: 50|16|jabaki hamane hee paida kiya hai manushy ko aur ham jaanate hain jo vichaar aate hain usake man mein tatha ham adhik sameep hain usase (usakee) praananaadee[1] se.
50|17|jabaki[1] (usake) daayen-baayen do farishte likh rahe hain.
50|18|vah nahin bolata koee baat, magar use likhane ke lie usake paas ek nireekshak taiyaar hota hai.
50|19|aa pahunchee maut kee achetana (be hoshee) saty lekar. ye vahee hai, jis se too bhaag raha tha.
50|20|aur phoonk diya gaya soor (narasingha) mein. yahee yaatana ke vachan ka din hai.
50|21|tatha aayega pratyek praanee is dasha mein ki usake saath ek haankane[1] vaala aur ek gavaah hoga.
50|22|too isee se achet tha, to hamane door kar diya tera parda, to teree aankh aaj khoob dekh rahee hai.
50|23|tatha kaha usake saathee[1] neh ye hai, jo mere paas taiyaar hai.
50|24|donon (farishton ko aadesh hoga ki) phenk do narak mein pratyek kaafir (saty ke) virodhee ko.
50|25|bhalaee ke rokane vaale, adharmee, sandeh karane vaale ko.
50|26|jisane bana lie allaah ke saath doosare poojy, to donon ko phenk do, kadee yaatana mein.
50|27|usake saathee (shaitaan) ne kahaah he hamaare paalanahaar! mainne ise kupath nahin kiya, parantu, vah svayan door ke kupath mein tha.
50|28|allaah ne kahaah jhagada na karo mere paas. mainne to pahale hee (sansaar mein) tumhaaree or chetaavanee bhej dee thee.
50|29|nahin badalee jaatee baat mere paas[1] aur na main tanik bhee atyaachaaree hoon bhakton ke lie.
50|30|jis din ham kahenge narak se ki too bhar gayee? aur vah kahegee kya kuchh aur hai
50|31|tatha sameep kar dee jaayegee svarg, vah sadaachaariyon se kuchh door na hogee.
50|32|ye hai jisaka tumhen vachan diya jaata tha, pratyek dhyaanamagn rakshak[1] ke lie.
50|33|jo dara atyant krpaasheel se bin dekhe tatha lekar aaya dhyaanamagn dil.
50|34|pravesh kar jao isamen, shaanti ke saath. ye sadaiv rahane ka din hai.
50|35|unheen ke lie, jo ve ichchha karenge usamen milega tatha hamaare paas (isase bhee) adhik hai.
